chart_version.description: Version of the Velero chart to install.

bucket.description: Name of the S3 bucket to store backups in

region.description: S3 Region - check your provider's documentation for the appropriate value. Single-location providers such as minio will have it as well.

retention.description: Rotation interval after which old backups are deleted. Defaults to 30 days.

access_key_id.description: AWS access key ID for S3 authentication

secret_access_key.description: AWS secret access key for S3 authentication
